title: How to Block Other Discord Users on Desktop and Mobile

steps.title: Open the Discord Desktop app.
steps.content: Open the Discord Desktop app. The Discord desktop app has a purple icon with an image that resembles a game controller with a smiley face. Click the Discord icon in the Windows Start menu, Apps folder (on Mac) to open Discord. Alternatively, you can go https://discord.com/app in a web browser and log in with the email address and password associated with your Discord account.

steps.title: Click the username or profile picture of the person you want to block.
steps.content: Click the username or profile picture of the person you want to block. This can be someone in a server or in your DMs. Clicking their username will either display their profile or display a drop-down menu next to their name.

steps.title: Click ⋮ or ⋯.
steps.content: Click ⋮ or ⋯ . It's generally in the upper-right corner of the drop-down menu or their profile page. This displays a drop-down menu. In a server, this icon will appear next to the username you click on. In your DMs, this will appear at the top of the menu to the left when you are in a chat with someone.

steps.title: Click Block.
steps.content: Click Block . It's in the drop-down menu that appears when click the icon with three dots. This displays a confirmation pop-up.

steps.title: Click Block again.
steps.content: Click Block again. It's in the confirmation pop-up. This blocks the user. [1] X Research source To unblock an user , click the Home icon which resembles the Discord logo in the upper-left corner. Then click Friends in the menu to the left. Click the Blocked tab and click the username of the person you want to unblock. Click Unblock .

steps.title: Open the Discord mobile app.
steps.content: Open the Discord mobile app. The Discord app has a purple icon with an image that resembles a game controller with a smiley face. Tap the Discord controller on your Home screen or apps menu to open it.

steps.title: Tap the profile picture of the person you want to block.
steps.content: Tap the profile picture of the person you want to block. Locate the person you want to block in a server or in your DMs. Tap the profile image next to their name. This displays their profile. Tapping the person's username will tag them in a comment, but will not display the profile.

steps.title: Tap ⋯.
steps.content: Tap ⋯ . It's the icon with three dots in the upper-right corner of the person's profile. This displays a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Tap Block.
steps.content: Tap Block . It's at the top of the menu that appears when you tap the icon with three dots. This displays a confirmation pop-up.

steps.title: Tap Block.
steps.content: Tap Block . It's in the confirmation pop-up. This blocks the user. To unblock a user, tap your profile icon the lower-right corner. Tap the Gear/Settings icon in the upper-right corner. Tap Account . Scroll down and tap Blocked users . Tap the user you want to unblock and tap Unblock .

steps.title: Blocked users are removed from your friend list.
steps.content: Blocked users are removed from your friend list. If the person you are blocking is on your friend list, they will be removed immediately.

steps.title: Blocked users cannot DM you.
steps.content: Blocked users cannot DM you. If any user you blocked tries to direct-message you , their messages will be blocked and you will not see them. The user will receive a message that says "Your message could not be delivered."

steps.title: Their messages will be hidden in servers.
steps.content: Their messages will be hidden in servers. If you and the person you blocked are members of any servers together, their messages will be blocked in the server. Instead, you will see "1 blocked message" in place of their message. If you want to see the message the person posted in a server, you can click or tap Show Message next to the "1 blocked message" post. If a blocked user tries to tag you in a post in a server, you will receive a notification or the message. Blocked users can still see your posts in servers.

steps.title: They can't add you as a friend.
steps.content: They can't add you as a friend. Blocked users will be unable to add you as a friend .

steps.title: They can't view your "About Me" page.
steps.content: They can't view your "About Me" page. Blocked users can see your profile image, but if they try to check out your profile, they will not see anything in the "About Me" section. They will not be able to see your bio, mutual servers, or friends.

steps.title: Blocked users are not notified that they are blocked.
steps.content: Blocked users are not notified that they are blocked. If you are wondering if blocked users are notified that they've been blocked, they are not. However there are other ways users can find out if they've been blocked .

steps.title: Blocked users can see your status in mutual servers.
steps.content: Blocked users can see your status in mutual servers. If you and the person you blocked are in a server together, they can still see your status. However, if you are not in the same server, they cannot see your status.
